Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: Standard Chartered Singpost Platinum Visa Credit Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: 7% CashBack on online purchases, 2% CashBack on Groceries and 0.2% on other purchases.
Get approval-in-principle in 60 seconds. Enjoy two years fee waiver and up to 5 free-for-life supplementary cards.
Claim a refund of 50% of the price difference if a lower price is found for online purchases within 30 days of purchase.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: $$138 Cashback OR
S$100 Cashback

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. S$138 Cashback if the application is submitted online.
2. S$100 Cashback if the application is submitted through other channels.
3. Promotion is valid till 30 June 2016.

Details.Name: sc_sup_annual_fee
Details.Feature: N/A

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Interest Rate
Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Max Cashback of S$60 per month.
To claim 50% of the price difference, a min of S$50 price difference is required.
Charge a min spend of S$600 per month to enjoy high CashBack rates.

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: 7% CashBack on eligible online purchases (min. $600 spend/month)
2% CashBack on supermarket purchases (min. $600 spend/month)
CashBack up to $720 a year
0.2% CashBack on other retail purchases

15% CashBack on dining with minimum spend $688 during qualifying periods (16 Jan to 15 Feb 2016, 16 Feb to 15 Mar 2016) (Capped at $88) Register online or SMS CNY(space)16-digit credit card number to 77222

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: 7% cashback on eligible online purchases, 0.2% on all other spend
Enjoy exclusive dining privileges with The Good LifeÂ®

15% CashBack on dining with minimum spend $688 during qualifying periods (16 Jan to 15 Feb 2016, 16 Feb to 15 Mar 2016) (Capped at $88) Register online or SMS CNY(space)16-digit credit card number to 77222

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: Get 2% CashBack on supermarket purchases

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: Enjoy 7% CashBack on eligible online spending (min. $600 spend per month)
10% off Speedpost Priority Service package, 5% off SMARTPAC with minimum order of three pieces
vPost - 30% off shipment for new customers and 20% off for subsequent shipments
Omigo - $20 off with minimum spend of $80 for new customers and 15% off subsequent purchases
